A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good movie\, a great reinvention of concepts as Force and others. A great performance by Mark Hamill\, Carrie Fisher\, Daisy Ridley\, etc\, and a beautiful story. Haters gonna hate\, always\, some people are no disposed to accept changes and are stuck in the past\, the last jedi takes the star wars mythology to a new age with a deeper story.
